vernac_cmds: Definition sa_distributive (A: Type) {JOIN: Join A} := forall a b x z, join a b z -> constructive_join_sub x z -> {a' : A & {b' : A & (constructive_join_sub a' a * constructive_join_sub b' b * join a' b' x)%type}}.
Theorem cross_split_distibutive {A} `{Perm_alg A}{SA: Sep_alg A}{CS: Cross_alg A} : sa_distributive A.
Theorem distributive_cross_split {A} `{Perm_alg A}{SA: Sep_alg A}{CA: Canc_alg A}: sa_distributive A -> Cross_alg A.
destruct (H0 a b c z H1) as [a' [b' [[?H ?H] ?H]]].
assert (H10: g = d); [ | rewrite H10 in *; auto].
rewrite <- H12 in *; clear H12 h.
exists x; exists x; repeat split; auto.
Lemma distributive_fun: forall A (JOIN: Join A) (key: Type), sa_distributive A -> @sa_distributive (key -> A) (Join_fun key A JOIN).
assert (J := fun (k: key) => X (a k) (b k) (x k) (z k) (H k) (X1 k)).
exists (fun k => proj1_sig (fst (fst (projT2 (projT2 (J k)))))); intro k; destruct (J k) as [ak' [bk' [[c c0] j]]]; simpl; destruct c; auto.
exists (fun k => proj1_sig (snd (fst (projT2 (projT2 (J k)))))); intro k; destruct (J k) as [ak' [bk' [[c c0] j]]]; simpl; destruct c0; auto.
intro k; destruct (J k) as [ak' [bk' [[c c0] j]]]; simpl; auto.
Instance cross_split_fun: forall A (JOIN: Join A) (key: Type), Cross_alg A -> Cross_alg (key -> A).
pose (f (x: key) := projT1 (X (a x) (b x) (c x) (d x) (z x) (H x) (H0 x))).
pose (g (x: key) := projT2 (X (a x) (b x) (c x) (d x) (z x) (H x) (H0 x))).
unfold ac, ad, bc, bd, f; clear ac ad bc bd f.
repeat split; intro x; simpl; generalize (g x); destruct (projT1 (X (a x) (b x) (c x) (d x) (z x) (H x) (H0 x))) as [[[? ?] ?] ?]; simpl; intuition.
Lemma sa_distributive_prod : forall A B saA saB, @sa_distributive A saA -> @sa_distributive B saB -> @sa_distributive (A * B) (Join_prod A _ B _).
destruct (X a1 b1 c1 z1 H) as [a1' [b1' [[[u1 ?] [v1 ?]] ?]]].
destruct (X0 a2 b2 c2 z2 H0) as [a2' [b2' [[[u2 ?] [v2 ?]] ?]]].
Instance Cross_prod : forall A B saA saB, @Cross_alg A saA -> @Cross_alg B saB -> @Cross_alg (A * B) (Join_prod _ saA _ saB).
destruct (X a1 b1 c1 d1 z1) as [p ?]; auto.
destruct p as [[[s1 p1] q1] r1].
destruct (X0 a2 b2 c2 d2 z2) as [p ?]; auto.
destruct p as [[[s2 p2] q2] r2].
Lemma sa_distributive_bij : forall A B JA bij, @sa_distributive A JA -> @sa_distributive B (Join_bij A JA B bij).
destruct (X (bij_g a) (bij_g b) (bij_g x) (bij_g z)) as [a' [b' [[[? ?] [? ?]] ?]]]; auto.
exists (bij_f x0); hnf; repeat rewrite bij_gf; auto.
exists (bij_f x1); hnf; repeat rewrite bij_gf; auto.
Lemma Cross_bij : forall A B JA bij, @Cross_alg A JA -> @Cross_alg B (Join_bij A JA B bij).
destruct (X (bij_g a) (bij_g b) (bij_g c) (bij_g d) (bij_g z)); auto.
destruct x as [[[s p] q] r].

Lemma constructive_join_sub_smash {A} {JA: Join A}{PA: Perm_alg A}{SA: Sep_alg A}{CA: Disj_alg A}: (forall x:A, {identity x}+{~identity x}) -> forall a c : lifted JA, constructive_join_sub (proj1_sig a) (proj1_sig c) -> @constructive_join_sub (option (lifted JA)) _ (Some a) (Some c).
destruct a; destruct c; simpl in *.
Lemma sa_distributive_smash : forall A JA {PA: Perm_alg A}{SA: Sep_alg A}{CA: Disj_alg A}, (forall x:A, {identity x}+{~identity x}) -> @sa_distributive A JA -> sa_distributive (option (lifted JA)).
2: intros; assert (b=z) by (inv H; auto); subst z; exists None; exists x; split; [split|]; auto; [ econstructor | ]; constructor.

2: intros b [[z Hz]|] ? ?; [assert (a=z) by (inv H; auto); subst z; clear H; rewrite (proof_irr Hz Ha) in X1; clear Hz; exists b; exists None; split; [split|]; auto | elimtype False; inv H]; [ econstructor | ]; constructor.
2: intros ? ? ?; exists None; exists None; split; [split|]; econstructor; econstructor.
destruct (X0 a b c z) as [a' [b' [[? ?] ?]]].
destruct (X a') as [Pa'|Pa']; [exists None | exists (Some (mk_lifted _ (nonidentity_nonunit Pa'))) ].
assert (b'=c) by (eapply join_eq; try apply j; apply identity_unit; eauto).
destruct (X b') as [Pb'|Pb']; [exists None | exists (Some (mk_lifted _ (nonidentity_nonunit Pb')))].
Lemma Cross_smash : forall A (JA: Join A) {PA: Perm_alg A}{SA: Sep_alg A}{CA: Disj_alg A}, (forall x:A, {identity x}+{~identity x}) -> Cross_alg A -> Cross_alg (option (lifted JA)).
apply join_unit1_e in H; [ | apply None_identity].
exists (None,None,c,d); repeat split; auto; constructor; auto.
apply join_unit2_e in H; [ | apply None_identity].
exists (c,d,None,None); repeat split; auto; constructor; auto.
apply join_unit1_e in H0; [ | apply None_identity].
exists (None, Some (exist nonunit _ Na), None, Some (exist nonunit _ Nb)); repeat split; auto; constructor.
apply join_unit2_e in H0; [ | apply None_identity].
exists (Some (exist nonunit _ Na), None,Some (exist nonunit _ Nb),None); repeat split; auto; constructor; auto.
destruct z as [[z Nz] | ]; [ | elimtype False; inv H].
destruct (X0 a b c d z) as [[[[ac ad] bc] bd] [? [? [? ?]]]]; try (inv H; inv H0; auto).
exists (None, Some (exist nonunit a Na), Some (exist nonunit b Nb), None); repeat split; auto; constructor.
exists (None, Some (exist nonunit a Na), Some (exist nonunit c Nc), Some (exist nonunit bd (nonidentity_nonunit Nbd))).
exists (Some (exist nonunit a Na), None, None, Some (exist nonunit b Nb)); repeat split; auto; constructor.
exists (Some (exist nonunit a Na), None, Some (exist nonunit _ Nbc), Some (exist nonunit d Nd)); repeat split; auto; constructor.
exists (Some (exist nonunit c Nc), Some (exist nonunit _ Nad), None, Some (exist nonunit b Nb)); repeat split; auto; try constructor.
exists (Some (exist nonunit ac Nac), Some (exist nonunit d Nd), Some (exist nonunit b Nb), None).
exists (Some (exist nonunit ac Nac), Some (exist nonunit ad Nad), Some (exist nonunit bc Nbc), Some (exist nonunit bd Nbd)).
Lemma cross_split_fpm : forall A B (JB: Join B) (PB: Perm_alg B)(SB : Sep_alg B)(CB: Disj_alg B) (Bdec: forall x:B, {identity x}+{~identity x}) , Cross_alg B -> Cross_alg (fpm A (lifted JB)) .
intros [a Ha] [b Hb] [c Hc] [d Hd] [z Hz].
destruct (X0 a b c d z); auto.
destruct x as [[[s p] q] r].
exists (exist _ s Hs, exist _ p Hp, exist _ q Hq, exist _ r Hr).
Lemma Cross_fpm (A B: Type){JB: Join B} {PB: Perm_alg B}{PosB : Pos_alg B} {CrB: Cross_alg B}: Cross_alg (fpm A B) .
assert (join a b z) by (clear - H; inv H; auto).
assert (join c d z) by (clear - H0; inv H0; auto).
destruct (CrB _ _ _ _ _ H1 H2) as [[[[s p] q] r] [? [? [? ?]]]].
exists (Some s, Some p, Some q, Some r); repeat split; try constructor; auto.
assert (z = Some c) by (clear - H0; inv H0; auto).
assert (join a b c) by (clear - H; inv H; auto).
exists (Some a, None, Some b, None); repeat split; try constructor; auto.
assert (z=Some d) by (clear - H0; inv H0; auto).
exists (None, Some a, None, Some b); repeat split; try constructor; auto.
elimtype False; inv H0; inv H.
assert (z = Some a) by (clear - H; inv H; auto).
exists (Some c, Some d, None, None); repeat split; try constructor; eauto.
assert (z = Some a) by (clear - H; inv H; auto).
assert (a=c) by (clear - H0; inv H0; auto).
exists (Some a, None, None, None); repeat split; try constructor; auto.
assert (z=d) by (clear - H0; inv H0; auto).
assert (z = Some a) by (inv H; auto).
exists (None, Some a, None, None); repeat split; try constructor; auto.
exists (None, None, Some c, Some d); repeat split; try constructor; auto.
assert (z = Some b) by (inv H; auto); subst.
exists (None, None, Some b, None); repeat split; try constructor; auto.
assert (z=d) by (clear - H0; inv H0; auto).
exists (None, None, None, Some b); repeat split; try constructor; auto.
intros [a Ha] [b Hb] [c Hc] [d Hd] [z Hz].
destruct (X (fun x => a x) b c d z); auto.
destruct x as [[[s p] q] r].
exists (exist _ s Hs, exist _ p Hp, exist _ q Hq, exist _ r Hr).
Definition opposite_bij {A B} (b: bijection A B) : bijection B A := Bijection _ _ (bij_g _ _ b) (bij_f _ _ b) (bij_gf _ _ b) (bij_fg _ _ b).
Lemma Cross_bij' : forall A B JA JB bij, @Cross_alg B JB -> JB = (Join_bij A JA B bij) -> @Cross_alg A JA.
destruct (X (bij_f a) (bij_f b) (bij_f c) (bij_f d) (bij_f z)).
destruct x as [[[s p] q] r].
Definition option_bij {A B} (D: bijection A B) : bijection (option A) (option B).
apply (Bijection (option A) (option B) (fun a => match a with Some a' => Some (bij_f _ _ D a') | None => None end) (fun b => match b with Some b' => Some (bij_g _ _ D b') | None => None end)).
